unnormalised: India vs. Pakistan was a nail-biter yesterday! India won by 6 wickets. Chasing 159, Virat Kohli smashed 82 off 53 balls. What a knock!
normalised: India versus Pakistan was a nail-biter yesterday! India won by six wickets. Chasing one hundred and fifty nine, Virat Kohli smashed eighty two off fifty three balls. What a knock!

unnormalised: Earlier, Pakistan scored 158/8 in their 20 overs. Hardik Pandya took 3 wickets for just 30 runs. The match was played at the MCG in front of a crowd of over 90,000.
normalised: Earlier, Pakistan scored one hundred and fifty eight divided by eight in their twenty overs. Hardik Pandya took three wickets for just thirty runs. The match was played at the M-C-G in front of a crowd of over ninety thousand.

unnormalised: India's score after 10 overs was just 63/3, but Kohli and Pandya put on a crucial partnership. The required run rate was over 10 an over at one point, but Kohli kept his cool.
normalised: India's score after ten overs was just sixty three divided by three, but Kohli and Pandya put on a crucial partnership. The required run rate was over ten an over at one point, but Kohli kept his cool.

unnormalised: Fans are already calling it one of the best T20 matches ever. India now sits at the top of Group 2 with 2 points. Next match is on 27/10 against Netherlands. Let's go Team India!
normalised: Fans are already calling it one of the best T-twenty matches ever. India now sits at the top of Group two with two points. Next match is on twenty seventh October against Netherlands. Let's go Team India!
